# Ace Citizenship - Complete Documentation

> Comprehensive U.S. citizenship test preparation platform helping immigrants achieve their American dream

## Product Overview

Ace Citizenship is a freemium iOS app and web platform designed to help aspiring U.S. citizens prepare for the USCIS naturalization interview. The app provides study tools for the official civics questions, English reading/writing practice, and interview preparation guidance.

## The U.S. Citizenship Test

### Test Format
- 10 questions asked during naturalization interview
- 6 correct answers required to pass
- Questions drawn from official USCIS pool
- Some questions have state-specific answers

### Question Categories

**American Government**
- Principles of American democracy
- System of government
- Rights and responsibilities
- The Constitution and amendments
- Federal, state, and local government

**American History**
- Colonial period and independence
- The Civil War and its effects
- Recent American history
- Civil rights movement
- Important historical figures

**Integrated Civics**
- Geography (states, capitals, landmarks)
- National symbols and holidays
- Citizenship responsibilities

## App Features

### Study System
- **128 Official Questions**: Complete USCIS M-1778 (09/25) question bank
- **Spaced Repetition**: Optimized learning algorithm for retention
- **Flashcard Mode**: Randomized questions with instant feedback
- **Progress Dashboard**: Track questions attempted, correct answers, mastery level

### Personalization
- **State Selection**: Choose your state of residence
- **Auto-Population**: Senators, Governor, Representative automatically inserted
- **Adaptive Content**: Questions adjust to your location

### User Experience
- Light and dark mode support
- Sound effects and haptic feedback
- Streak tracking for motivation
- First-time user onboarding carousel

## Pricing Model

### Free Tier
- Access to all 128 civics questions
- Core study features and flashcards
- Progress tracking
- Light/dark mode

### One-Time Purchase
- State-specific question variations
- Advanced personalization features
- No subscription required

## Blog Content (28+ Articles)

### Study Strategies
- 30-day study plans
- 10 tips for test success
- Spaced repetition explained
- Memory techniques

### Test Sections
- Civics questions breakdown
- Reading test preparation
- Writing test preparation
- Interview checklist

### Special Circumstances
- 65/20 exception (simplified test for seniors)
- ESL learner tips
- Test anxiety management
- Accommodations for disabilities

### Procedural Guides
- N-400 application walkthrough
- Interview timeline expectations
- Naturalization ceremony guide
- Post-citizenship steps

### Content Topics
- Bill of Rights explained
- Constitution overview
- Three branches of government
- Presidents and founding fathers
- Federal holidays significance

## Technical Architecture

### iOS App
- SwiftUI native interface
- SwiftData for persistence
- StoreKit for in-app purchases
- AVFoundation for sounds/haptics

### Web Platform
- FastAPI backend
- HTMX + Jinja2 templates
- SQLAlchemy with SQLite
- Markdown blog system
- Admin panel for content

### Hosting
- iOS App Store (ID: 6532592671)
- Web: Railway (FastAPI backend)

## Target Audience

- Immigrants preparing for naturalization interview
- ESL students learning about U.S. government
- Educators teaching civics
- Anyone interested in U.S. citizenship requirements
